TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 为包含单项内容并具有标头的所有控件提供基实现。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承属性从并定义的类型的属性。 inherits the property from and defines the property that is of type . 提供控件的标题。 provides a heading for the control. 如属性、可以是任何类型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 下图显示了两个对象，它们继承自。The following illustration shows two objects, which inherit from . 第一个具有对象中的内容作为和:设置为包含和;设置为包含和。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二个设置为一个字符串和设置为 single 。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 使用的标头属性中的其他类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property A具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 应用程序开发人员可以创建，但其外观将非常简单。An application developer can create a , but its appearance will be very simple. 如果你想要提高控件的外观，你可以创建一个新。If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . A可用于创建自定义控件，因为它提供用于使用标头的单个内容控件的模型。A is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers. 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建备注部分中所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the Remarks section. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下面的示例演示如何创建为。The following examples show how to create a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrol)]

[!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下图显示由前面的示例。The following illustration shows the created by the previous example. ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 使用的标头属性中的其他类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 下面的示例创建两个对象来指定的外观和的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 属性显示为字符串，应如何设置该属性的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果你设置或属性、忽略属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定到的集合`Student`对象。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`类具有`Name`属性的一个集合`Course`对象，并实现方法来返回`Name`学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 该示例使用要置于学生的名称每个(其继承自)，和显示的内容中的每个学生课程列表。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下面的示例实现方法来返回`Name`学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]
